item.title: BXP Africa & Asia FIX 150.3 ETS2
item.description:
BXP Africa & Asia FIX 150.3 ETS2

BXP Africa & Asia FIX 150.3 – 31.07.2024.

Compatibility patch fix for African and Asian maps
Load above Horn of Africa, Heart of Africa, Beyond, South East Asia, Java Road revolution, Trans Siberian Truckway, Road Into Wilderness, BXP Tunisia and road connections
BALKAN XP
Boon2024: creator and mapper
ArayasFan69420 : specialist
Pizy317: mapper and editor
XesXand: development and strategy

TEST DRIVERS
Doom Walker
geese goose
Phreel
PinkPanzerfaust
RDV Gaming Haul
Serb1205
snap1704



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: BXP 1mod2 FERRY them all 150.4 ETS2
item.description:
BXP 1mod2 FERRY them all 150.4 ETS2

BXP 1mod2 FERRY them all v150

– Ferry mod that combines and connects ALL available maps
– better compatibility overall in map combinations and job selections
– redifined, synchronised, cleaned ferries with no wrong trip durations
– load above every map mod and give highest priority to work
– compatible with all available maps and always will be
– The only ferry mod you’ll ever need

BALKAN XP
Boon2024: creator and mapper
ArayasFan69420 : specialist
Pizy317: mapper and editor
XesXand: development and strategy

TEST DRIVERS
Doom Walker
geese goose
Phreel
PinkPanzerfaust
RDV Gaming Haul
Serb1205
snap1704

31.07.2024. new in 150.4 :
– Laos railways (SEA) connected with Dalian (RTA-China)
– extended support for SEA in Gulf of Thailand
– added Vladivostok – Vanimo ferry
– extended support for BXP Tunisia, RiW and Beyond map

11.07.2024. new in 150.3 :
– added support for BXP Yugoslavia Expansion
– added extended support for Poti and Novorossiysk
19.06.2024. new in 150.2 :
– excluded ridiculous ferry from OTGR map to Helsinki
– added Poti (Promods) Trabzon (ROEX) ferry connection
– added support for Donbass map by Boris Britva
– added Poti – Baku ferry because of current map combo situation

12.06.2024. new in 150.1 :
– added support for Trans Siberian Truckway and RC’s

08.06.2024. new in 150.0 :
– added support for Maldives and Beyond map
– added support for Italy Map Project (IMP)

05.05.2024. new in 149.7 :
– minor corrections in Mediterranean sea

02.05.2024. new in 149.6 :
– minor corrections in Norway, Northern Ireland and Scotland
– minor corrections in Mediterranean sea and Africa
– YOM only connected to Suakin until further development
– few lines lost due to map expansion (find my load order on SCS)

16.04.2024. new in 149.5 :
– minor corrections and extended support in Mediterranean sea
– minor corrections in UK, NIR and Ireland
– added support for Road to Athens reborn

01.04.2024. new in 149.4 :
– added support for Italy map project and Corfu map
– minor corrections and extended support in Mediterranean sea
– added support for Baleares and redefined support for Greenland
– added support for Baleares – North Afrika road connection
– SFIGC and Jan Mayen optimized and corrected connections
– added and corrected support for Nordic Extended
– minor corrections in Norway ports and St. Petersburg
– added and corrected support for Horn of Africa
– added support for PM v2.68 & West Balkans DLC Merge {Balkanska Spajalica}
– huge corrections in African and Middle East ports for better compatibility

05.03.2024. new in 149.3 :
– Rhodes optimized with ROEX
– Tripoli connected to Izmir
– Maghreb, Euroafrica, Road to Africa optimized
– North Afrika support added and optimized
– minor correction in Russian Open Spaces
– rerouting for BOT Belushia Guba due to defected port

29.02.2024. new in 149.2 :
– full and copmplete Africa, Asia and Russia connections
– Belt of Tundra disconnected from Helsinki
– Belt of Tundra corrected, optimized and connected to ROS and RTA
– redefined, corrected ferries for Russian Open Spaces (ROS)
– TransSiberian railroad optimized and connected
– West Africa map optimized and connected
– Heart of Africa corrected, optimized and connected
– Road into Wilderness corrected, optimized and connected
– Road into wilderness connected with West Africa, JRR and SEA
– South East Asia fully optimized and connected to RTA, JRR and Russia
– Road to Africa optimized and connected to Capetown, JRR, SEA and ROEX
– Tripoli connected to Istanbul, Napoli, Durres, Palermo and Annaba
– Euroafrica corrected and synchronised with other lines
– compatible with ALL map combos; promods, non-promods, WB merge…
– if in any case that’s not the case, let me know 🙂

09.02.2024. new in 149.1 :
– EAA connected via Roscoff
– Roscoff connected to Dover

08.02.2024. new in 149.0 :
– EAA connected via Plymouth and Santander

05.02.2024. new in 148.2 :
– Belt of Tundra disconnected from Gdansk and Helsinki
– Belt of Tundra connected to RTA, ROS and Off the Grid map

21.11.2023. new in 148.1 :
– minor corrections in UK ports
– adapted for UK Rebuild map

22.10.2023. new in 148.0 :
– adapted for West Balkans DLC

02.07.2023. new in 147.0 :
– ferry support for Altai map via Sibir and Wuqia
– Sibir – Calais connection removed

19.02.2023. new in 146.7 :
– redefined ferry support for West Africa (all versions should work)
– minor corrections between Formachevo and RTA China
– Caspian and Black sea corrections and extended support

10.02.2023. new in 146.6 :
– added correct support for Maldives, Balearic islands and Ibiza
– minor corrections and extended support in Mediterranean sea

05.02.2023. new in 146.5 :
– redifined, corrected ferries and added extra support for Roads of Chunghwa (R.O.C.)
– not showing Pula, Zadar, Ancona ports in specific map combos; fixed by Mich

04.02.2023. new in 146.4 :
– minor corrections and extended support in Mediterranean sea

03.02.2023. new in 146.3 :
– added support for Greenland Expanded
– minor corrections in Adriatic sea

02.02.2023. new in 146.2 :
– added ferry support for Southeast Asia map ver0.2.1.1(Fix)
– corrected JRR ferry Merak – Calais

31.01.2023. new in 146.1 :
– added ferry support for all the maps available on 01 february 2023.
– Tallin – Kirov – Barnaul connection for Altay map (it is what it is)
– All ferries revised and synchronised for ALL compatible maps in game
– Worldwide all the seas and oceans 360 globe = 100 % coverage completed

1mod2 FERRY them all v146.0
Ferry mod that combines and connects ALL available maps giving better
compatibility overall in map combinations and job selections.

enjoy your ride or report your issue



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Comil Campione 3.65 Generation I 1.50 ETS2
item.description:
Comil Campione 3.65 Generation I 1.50 ETS2

Tested on version 1.50
1. Fully Animated on Exterior cam (like Door, Porta, Baggage, and window).
2. Fully Animated on Interior cam (like clutch,gas,brake pedal,key,window,door,porta).
3. Stable physic.
4. Include interior light (Press O to activate).
5. Include own Sound (OM457LA). And support Convoy Multiplayer.
6. Standalone Mods.
7. Include 4K Skins.
8. Include Animated Signs.
With great detail model and high quality texture, you can find on this mods.
And well this model i took from omsi 2 and reconvert them to ets2.



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.

item.title: Som do interior mais alto v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Som do interior mais alto v1.0 ETS2

Louder_Interior_Sound
Compatible with version 1.50.x
The mod makes the sound inside the truck louder
Improves the view from the rearview mirror
Changes the headlight transition from straight red to green
Flashing headlights from 10:00 p.m. until 5:00 a.m.
And makes traffic more intense, more chances of getting stuck in traffic jams
Have a good game!



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
